gw.api.domain.invoice

Interface InvoiceItemExceptionContext


  • public interface InvoiceItemExceptionContext
    Provides information useful to implementers of the IInvoiceItem plugin. An instance of this interface is passed to all methods on the plugin and can be used to:
    • See which event caused the plugin call (Execute, Reversal etc.)
    • Check whether an invoice item is eligible for exceptions

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InvoiceItemExceptionEvent getEvent()
      The event that made the plugin call necessary
      boolean isEligibleForPaymentException(InvoiceItem invoiceItem)
      Is the given invoice item eligible to have a payment exception?
      boolean isEligibleForPromiseException(InvoiceItem invoiceItem)
      Is the given invoice item eligible to have a promise exception?

    • Method Detail

      • getEvent

        InvoiceItemExceptionEvent getEvent()
        The event that made the plugin call necessary
        Returns:
        a non null event
        See Also:
        InvoiceItemExceptionEvent

      • isEligibleForPaymentException

        boolean isEligibleForPaymentException(InvoiceItem invoiceItem)
        Is the given invoice item eligible to have a payment exception? An invoice item is considered eligible if it is not settled and it has at least one non reversed AgencyPaymentItem.
        Parameters:
        invoiceItem - a non null invoice item
        Returns:
        true if the invoice item is eligible, false otherwise

      • isEligibleForPromiseException

        boolean isEligibleForPromiseException(InvoiceItem invoiceItem)
        Is the given invoice item eligible to have a promise exception? An invoice item is considered eligible if it is not settled including promise and it has at least one active promise item.
        Parameters:
        invoiceItem - a non null invoice item
        Returns:
        true if the invoice item is eligible, false otherwise
